data.eml:eml: Panonychus from Georgia: survey, taxonomical status and redescription of P. hadzhibejliae (Reck, 1947) (Acari, Tetranychidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arabuli, Tea, Çobanoglu, Sultan, Auger, Philippe (2016): Panonychus from Georgia: survey, taxonomical status and redescription of P. hadzhibejliae (Reck, 1947) (Acari, Tetranychidae). Zootaxa 4114 (4): 464-476, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4114.4.6
